name: AstroEscape
description:
As an astronaut, you find yourself stranded in the depths of an abandoned space station. You have only a few precious seconds of oxygen left. The darkness surrounds you, and you can sense that you are not alone. You must use all your wits and skills to navigate the treacherous corridors and evade the unknown dangers that lurk within. Can you find the escape pod and make your way to safety before your oxygen runs out? The fate of the astronaut hangs in the balance.

Controls:

w/upmove ups/downmove downa/leftmove leftd/rightmove rightrrotate next room shape

Made with DragonRuby GTK.
